TextView.android:text: Your current policy is expiring on:
Covers damage to your vehicle and third party liabilities
Only covers third party losses, damage to your vehicle is not covered
Covers accidental damage to vehicle, third party liabilities are not covered
Select The Right IDV For You
*IDV is the maximum sum assured fixed by the insurer that is offered in case of theft or loss of vehicle
4 out of 5 users select an IDV within this range
*Coverage includes compensation of ₹ 15 Lakh to the family of the registered owner-driver in case of an accidental death.
